planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, faceup/facedown contact)
action: Buy a bounty card, even if in navpoint.If unable and on a planet, discard the top card of the cargo market deck and gain credits 4 000
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, faceup contact)
c. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
d. Gain 1 reputation with this planet's faction (if any).
